channel.title: CVE Feed for Power Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Power Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-2817|2024-08-05T14:02:07.826Z -- power%20software -- poweriso
item.description: A stack buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the ISO parsing functionality of Power Software Ltd PowerISO 6.8. A specially crafted ISO file can cause a vulnerability resulting in potential code execution. An attacker can send a specific ISO file to trigger this vulnerability.
